thread.title: Customer Malcolm S.
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Customer Malcolm S.

author: Customer Malcolm S.
title: Customer Malcolm S.
text:
I had the email to say the time of arrival at between 4pm and 6pm, but then I had a message on the phone to say arrival in 25 minutes at about 10.30am (which I was more than happy with). Mark and Eric arrived at due time and set about the task very professionally on the drive. Twenty minutes later, all checked and paid for.
Great service, and all left clean and tidy!
